entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Question: How can I combine multiple IncrementalValuesProvider<T> #63093

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32729.218 #63087

PullRequests

Created

  • Add IOperation test where IObjectCreationOperation.Constructor is null #63092
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Enable NRT in analyzers layer #63090
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Add option to skip source link and embedded source #63089
    Area-IDE
  • Add telemetry for the time and files outputted for source generators #63088
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63086
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #63099
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/ConvertToRecord #63098
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/editorconfig_lsp #63097
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/DocumentOutline #63096
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #63095
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Keep the host solution pinned on the remote workspace side while performing an inline-rename session #62854
    Area-IDE
  • Update method invocation escape analysis to match spec changes #62886
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • `ref` parameters to `ref struct` types should be `scoped ref` by default #62778
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Support UnscopedRefAttribute #62783
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • [WIP] Partition integration tests #63067
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add progress bar to document outline window #63011
    Area-IDE
  • Support renaming multiple symbols in RenameLanguageService #62670
    Area-IDE
  • Upgrade to .NET 7 P6 SDK #63062
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Handle scenario where initial completion list contains only a single non-roslyn item #63083
    Area-IDE
  • Put correct function call for Return Attributes #63084
    Area-IDE
